sentence: Taylor Heinicke was 7-8 as Washington’s starter last season, when the initial plan to go with Ryan Fitzpatrick backfired when the veteran suffered a season-ending injury in Week 1.
author: Ryan Dunleavy
title: Seahawks set bar for Russell Wilson trade after declining Commanders’ hefty offer

sentence: According to ESPN’s Jeremy Fowler, the Steelers are interested in signing a top-tier safety to pair alongside incumbent starter Minkah Fitzpatrick.
author: DJ Siddiqi
title: Steelers Interested in Signing 3-Time Pro Bowler: Report

sentence: Top Needs: CB, Edge, S, OL Washington Commanders Additions: Washington traded for Carson Wentz, hoping he’s an upgrade over Ryan Fitzpatrick and Taylor Heinicke.

title: NFC offseason moves summary, 2022 NFL draft primer
